quoteFirst: The first ascent was made at
quoteLast: on August the 17th, under a south wind and with clouds covering some three-quarters of the sky. Welsh's first remark significant, and will be appreciated by anyone who has attempted observational work in a balloon.
title: The Dominion of the Air: The Story of Aerial Navigation
author: Bacon, John M. (John Mackenzie), 1846-1904

quoteFirst: In fact, he brooded over the incident.  This augured ill for Anthony.  The cold fact that in due season--to be precise, at
quoteLast: that same afternoon--Slip Along won his race easily did not improve matters. That he started at thirty-three to one was still less digestible....
title: Anthony Lyveden
author: Yates, Dornford, 1885-1960
